rows.label: qst700808_msg0001
rows.name:
Goodness... So you whippersnappers
were behind the littering, were you?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0002
rows.name:
I had such a lovely time talking to
you all back when I ran the shop...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0003
rows.name:
See, guys? There was never any need
for you to run away.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0004
rows.name:
She wasn't going to grow fangs and
gobble you up or anything!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0005
rows.name:
Grow fangs? Eat Ryuuryuu up?!
Old woman Ofa can do that?
Meeeeh...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0006
rows.name:
K-Kachakacha is not good to eat!
Is f-full of additives and flavorings!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0007
rows.name:
Komemi too gummy anyway.
Would not be able to chew...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0008
rows.name: I said she WON'T eat you!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0009
rows.name:
Now let's all calm down here
for a second.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0010
rows.name:
I take it you had good reason to do
what you did.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0011
rows.name:
You were probably only scattering
litter on the days that Ms. Ofa had
her walk, weren't you?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0012
rows.name: Wait, really?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0013
rows.name: Is 'cos we were feeling lonely...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0014
rows.name:
Kachakacha!
Please to shut mouth-trap!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0015
rows.name:
Old lady always nice to us every time
we visit shop. Always had friendliest
conversations.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0016
rows.name:
Was so much fun and plenty of free
time for Muskerpon. Made point of
visiting every day.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0017
rows.name: But then all that change.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0018
rows.name:
After Ms. Ofa leave stall, was always
on her own by self.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0019
rows.name:
Always taking walks to forest, looking
up at sky...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0020
rows.name: So Muskerpon had only one option...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0021
rows.name:
You wanted to give her some
company.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0022
rows.name:
But you were too embarrassed
to show it, so you hid and played
pranks on her instead.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0023
rows.name:
N-no, that all wrong! We do it to be
mean to her! Make life difficult for!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0024
rows.name:
Sure you did. All right, now
I understand everything.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0025
rows.name: Oh, you silly billies...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0026
rows.name:
I appreciate the sentiment, but you're
forgetting one very important thing.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0027
rows.name: What? What we forget?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0028
rows.name:
I go on my walks through the forest
because I enjoy having a bit of peace
and quiet. I wasn't at all lonely.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0029
rows.name: Not lonely?!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0030
rows.name:
Then...Ryuuryuu will stop littering now.
Whole plan was maybe big mistake
in first place.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0031
rows.name:
From now on, Four Muskerpon aim
to have new mission.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0032
rows.name:
Will have to shake brainbox, but will
find special something only Muskerpon
can do!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0033
rows.name: And when that done...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0034
rows.name:
No guarantees, but might even bother
to drop by time to time and say hello!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0035
rows.name:
Is that so? Well, I do look forward
to seeing you all again.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0036
rows.name: Yay! Kachakacha very glad!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0037
rows.name:
Is difficult for brother Ryuuryuu to speak
honest, but he not mean bad!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0038
rows.name:
Meh meh! Happy ending for all!
Three cheers for Four Muskerpon!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0039
rows.name: H-hey! Shut traps, all of you!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0040
rows.name:
You've been through a lot for this
old woman!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0041
rows.name:
Now I can enjoy my walks with
a peaceful mind.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0042
rows.name: Thank you, sincerely.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0043
rows.name:
You're very welcome, ma'am!
Now boys, no more falling out,
do you hear?
